column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi William & Anna - I'm sorry you found our ramen too salty and lacking in flavor. If you're ever unhappy with how your ramen turned out
column2: you can send it back immediately and we will prepare you another dish or remake it until you find the right flavor combinations to suit your palate. Nevertheless
column3: we wish you luck on your continued foodie adventures
column4: and we thank you very much for stopping by our humble home to give our ramen a spin.
